pageContext.claim: “If you look at the polls that came out today and yesterday -- and I guess a lot had to do with the debate or a lot had to do with the rallies. I don't know. But you take a look at the polls. Look at how we're doing in Wisconsin. Look how we're doing in Iowa. Look how we're doing in Ohio. Look how we're doing in Florida. Look how we're doing everywhere, practically.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently trailed Biden in the polls throughout the duration of the election, according to the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight.
